word_mean: 霜：类似冻结的露水或水蒸气
霜，夜间地面冷却到0℃以下时, 空气中的水汽凝华在地面或地物上的冰晶。

sentence.Network_en: The air was thin and crisp, filled with hazy sunshine and frost.
sentence.Network_cn: 空气稀薄清新，其间日光蒙眬，寒气逼人。

sentence.Network_en: We had 11 degrees of frost last night.
sentence.Network_cn: 昨天夜里气温降到了零下11度。

sentence.Network_en: It will be a clear night with some ground frost .
sentence.Network_cn: 今夜晴，部分地面有霜冻。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English frost, forst, of Germanic origin; related to Dutch vorst and German Frost, also to freeze

entry.def: When there is frost or a frost, the temperature outside falls below freezing point and the ground becomes covered in ice crystals.

example.ex: There is frost on the ground and snow is forecast...
example.tran: 地上结霜了，而且预报说会有雪。

example.ex: The wind had veered to north, bringing clear skies and a keen frost.
example.tran: 风向已经转北，带来了晴朗的天空和严重的霜冻。

entry.def: When someone says that there are a particular number of degrees of frost they mean that the temperature is that number of degrees below freezing point.

example.ex: We had 11 degrees of frost last night.
example.tran: 昨天夜里气温降到了零下 11 度。

means.word_mean: 1. ice crystals forming a white deposit (especially on objects outside)
2. weather cold enough to cause freezing
3. the formation of frost or ice on a surface
2. provide with a rough or speckled surface or appearance;

sentences.sentence: "The icy precipitation frosted the flowers and athey turned brown"

auth_sentence.content: The first frost in fall comes later and later.
auth_sentence.res_content: The first frost in fall comes later and later.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The first frost in fall comes later and later.

auth_sentence.content: We fought an army of frost giants last week.
auth_sentence.res_content: We fought an army of frost giants last week.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We fought an army of frost giants last week.

auth_sentence.content: Sometimes there's frost on the rabbits' fur.
auth_sentence.res_content: Sometimes there's frost on the rabbits' fur.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Sometimes there's frost on the rabbits' fur.

sentences.en: The fields have frosted up in this wintry morning.
sentences.cn: 在这寒冷的早晨田野里覆盖着一层霜。

sentences.en: The cold has frosted the windows.
sentences.cn: 寒冷的天气使窗子结满了霜。

sentences.en: The drop in temperature frosted the tomato plants.
sentences.cn: 气温下降冻坏了番茄苗。

sentences.en: Frosts spoil the last of the flowers.
sentences.cn: 霜冻冻坏了最后一批花朵。

jushi.english: The cold has frosted the windows.
jushi.chinese: 寒冷的天气使窗子结满了霜。

jushi.english: The drop in temperature frosted the tomato plants.
jushi.chinese: 气温下降冻坏了番茄苗。

jushi.english: The young shoots on the trees have been damaged by frost.
jushi.chinese: 树上的嫩芽被严寒冻坏了。
